name: Grandpa's House
description:
You have been dropped off at your grandpa's house who hates games. You however brought your games and need to use them to survive the night. Your alertness will go down if you turn OFF the games and rise again when they're ON. Don't fall asleep.



Survive 7 rounds of Grandpa checking in on you, grabbing cubes, swatting spiders, and managing your screens to win the game.
Grandpa will check on the player any time he hears noise from the games. Click spiders to swat them away and do not let them land on the bed.
Use fast-paced movements in this still player-based game to manage your electronics and keep Grandpa away and survive seven rounds.
